thread.title: ThanksUSA to Celebrate TEN Years Benefiting Military Families Through Education

author: cbs8
title: ThanksUSA to Celebrate TEN Years Benefiting Military Families Through Education
text:
ThanksUSA
Special Appearance at Gala by Nation's First Female Navy Commander
WASHINGTON , Oct. 5, 2015 /PRNewswire-USNewswire/ -- ThanksUSA, the national non-profit dedicated to thanking America's troops through the gift of education will celebrate its ten-year anniversary at its Treasure Our Troops Gala featuring keynote speaker Admiral Michelle Howard .
WHAT:
ThanksUSA tenth anniversary Treasure Our Troops Gala
Special tributes with Members of US Senate and House
Video debut of ThanksUSA's new PSA
WHO:
ThanksUSA scholarship winners - children and spouses of US troops
Keynote:
Admiral Michelle J. Howard, Vice-Chief of Naval Operations
Honorees:
General Norton A. Schwartz, USAF (Ret.)
USA Funds
Emcee:
Jim Handly, NBC4 Washington
WHEN:
October 6, 2015
6:00 P.M.
WHERE:
Four Seasons Hotel Washington DC
2800 Pennsylvania Avenue NW
Washington, DC
WHY:
To celebrate America's military families on ThanksUSA's tenth anniversary. The national non-profit organization provides need-based scholarships to the children and spouses of US servicemen and women. Since its inception in 2005, ThanksUSA has distributed nearly 3,700 post-secondary school scholarships valued at more than $11 million to families in all 50 states and the District of Columbia. For more information, visit www.ThanksUSA.org .
For more information, contact Michele Stork at (703) 855-4108 or MicheleStork@ThanksUSA.org .
CONTACT:
Michele Stork
(703) 855-4108
MicheleStork@ThanksUSA.org
